title: Assistant Priest
description: We are seeking a dedicated Assistant Priest to support our daily rituals, abhishekams, and festival ceremonies. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Vedic traditions.
requirements: Formal education in Vedic studies (Veda Pathashala)
Experience in performing daily pujas and alankaram
Fluency in Sanskrit and local languages
Sattvic lifestyle and adherence to temple customs

title: Office Administrator
description: Manage the temple office operations, devotee inquiries, donation receipts, and general coordination.
requirements: Good communication skills in Hindi, Marathi, and English
Prior experience in NGO or Temple administration is a plus

title: Prasadam Cook
description: Prepare hygienic and traditional prasadam for daily offerings and special events.
requirements: Experience in cooking large quantities of vegetarian food
Knowledge of traditional sattvic cooking methods

title: Event Coordinator (Volunteer)
description: Help organize and manage crowd control during major festivals like Brahmotsavam and holidays.
requirements: Ability to work with diverse teams
